SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NM , MEMBER_EMAIL , INTRO, BLOG_NO, BLOG_TITLE, SNS_EMAIL, SNS_GIT, SNS_TWITT, SNS_FBOOK, SNS_HOME
FROM MEMBER JOIN BLOG USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER_SNS USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND STATUS_CD = 200
SELECT MEMBER_IMG_PATH, MEMBER_IMG_NM, MEMBER_IMG_ORIGINAL FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBER_IMG USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND STATUS_CD = 200
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ? , INTRO = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE BLOG SET BLOG_TITLE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

UPDATE MEMBER_SNS SET SNS_EMAIL = ?, SNS_GIT = ?, SNS_TWITT = ?, SNS_FBOOK = ?, SNS_HOME = ?
WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER_IMG SET MEMBER_IMG_NM =?, MEMBER_IMG_ORIGINAL = ?, MEMBER_IMG_PATH = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
